verses.verse: (Promised Faithfulness to the LORD) A Psalm of David. [1] I will sing of mercy and justice; To You, O LORD, I will sing praises.
I will behave wisely in a perfect way. Oh, when will You come to me? I will (1 Kin. 11:4) walk within my house with a perfect heart.
I will set nothing wicked before my eyes; (Ps. 97:10) I hate the work of those (Josh. 23:6) who fall away; It shall not cling to me.
A perverse heart shall depart from me; I will not ((Ps. 119:115)) know wickedness.
Whoever secretly slanders his neighbor, Him I will destroy; (Prov. 6:17) The one who has a haughty look and a proud heart, Him I will not endure.
My eyes shall be on the faithful of the land, That they may dwell with me; He who walks in a perfect way, He shall serve me.
He who works deceit shall not dwell within my house; He who tells lies shall not continue in my presence.
((Ps. 75:10); Jer. 21:12) Early I will destroy all the wicked of the land, That I may cut off all the evildoers (Ps. 48:2, 8) from the city of the LORD.
